REMO2015 is the 2015 release of the regional climate model REMO. It is based on the former numerical weather prediction model of the German Weather Service (EUROPA-MODELL). The physical parameterizations are mainly based on ECHAM4 adapted and developed for regional applications. The model has a hydrostatic dynamical core and a hybrid-sigma vertical pressure coordinate. The spatial discretization uses a rotated latitude longitude grid mapping and, in standard configuration, 27 levels in the vertical. REMO2015 supports fractional land surface cover (land, water, ice). The model is also coupled to the MPI ocean model MPI-OM.
